title: Gabriel Rozenberg - CBAMBOO | Sustainability & ESG in Taxation Speaker
author: unknown
text: Gabriel Rozenberg Founder & CEO at CBAMBOO Gabriel Rozenberg Founder & CEO at CBAMBOO Profile Gabriel Rozenberg has spent his career at the intersection of climate, public policy and finance. He is co-founder and CEO of CBAMBOO, the operating system for the world’s carbon border taxes. Gabriel began his career at The Times, where he was the newspaper’s Economics Reporter. He then worked as an analyst and investment director at two hedge funds, and was active in London politics, before launching CBAMBOO in 2023. Gabriel holds a BA in Philosophy, Politics and Economics from the University of Oxford. Agenda Sessions Navigating the EU CBAM Transitional Period & Preparing for the Future , 15:00 View Session
